SELECT_ONE.SQL: SELECT GatewaySeqNo , GatewayName, MacAddress FROM KGATEWAY WHERE GatewaySeqNo = @GatewaySeqNo OR MacAddress = @MacAddress OR GatewayName = @GatewayName

SELECT_ALL.SQL: SELECT GatewaySeqNo, GatewayName, MacAddress FROM KGATEWAY

SELECT_ONE.SQL: SELECT BeaconSeqNo, BeaconName, MacAddress FROM KBEACON WHERE BeaconSeqNo = @BeaconSeqNo OR MacAddress = @MacAddress OR BeaconName = @BeaconName

SELECT_ALL.SQL: SELECT BeaconSeqNo, BeaconName, MacAddress FROM KBEACON

UPDATE_ONE.SQL: UPDATE KBEACON SET(BeaconName = @BeaconName, MacAddress = @MacAddress) WHERE BeaconSeqNo = @BeaconSeqNo

MAC_ADDRESS.SQL: SELECT kb.BeaconSeqNo, kg.GatewaySeqNo FROM KBEACON kb, KGATEWAY kg WHERE kb.MacAddress = BeaconMac AND kg.MacAddress = GatewayMac

INSERT_ONE.SQL: INSERT INTO ADVDATA (Message,Rssi,GatewaySeqNo,BeaconSeqNo,MessageIndex) VALUES (@Message ,@Rssi,(SELECT GatewaySeqNo FROM KGATEWAY WHERE KGATEWAY.MacAddress = @GatewayMac),(SELECT BeaconSeqNo FROM KBEACON WHERE KBEACON.MacAddress = @BeaconMac),@MessageIndex);
